articles.title: Awkwafina Addresses Blaccent And AAVE Criticism; Leaves Twitter - Deadline
articles.description: Awkwafina is leaving Twitter for now.  The actress whose real name is Nora Lum Tweeted release a statement earlier today addressing the criticisms for her use of African American Vernacular English (AAVE). She starts the apology by stating, “There is a sociop…

articles.title: U.S. restores sanctions waiver to Iran with nuclear talks in final phase - Reuters
articles.description: President Joe Biden's administration on Friday restored sanctions waivers to Iran to allow international nuclear cooperation projects, as indirect American-Iranian talks on reviving the 2015 international nuclear deal with Tehran enter the final stretch.
articles.content: WASHINGTON, Feb 4 (Reuters) - President Joe Biden's administration on Friday restored sanctions waivers to Iran to allow international nuclear cooperation projects, as indirect American-Iranian talks… [+3799 chars]
